tweets.text: It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe Please share these pictures of children suffering locally. Residents need air purifiers to sleep. @EnvAgency are negligent and allowing it to happen. Please share and sign the petition to make sure this does not happen in the UK ever again #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/PQebyt4QnB

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

Knowing that children and babies are choking on Landfill Gasses and that their parents weep and that toddlers are hugging air purifiers enrages and tortures me. @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @carolecadwalla @DJAndyMoor @StinkStopthe

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text: This site was being filled for short term gain when it was in operation by more than one operator. It was a scam. ‚Å¶@EnvAgency‚Å© failed to get a grip and it quickly became a major problem. When will actions be taken to stop the same scams happening? https://t.co/TwqJ7ajnXl

@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice I don't understand, bear with me I've only had 6 hours sleep since Friday due to the toxic stench, what gives @RedIndustries2 the right to pollute my air with H2S & what gives @ClareDinnisEA  & @EnvAgencySE the right to ignore us?
